description: A unique identifier for the NLP record.
comment: Primary Key for the NOTE_NLP table

description: This is the NOTE_ID for the NOTE record the NLP record is associated to.
The SECTION_CONCEPT_ID should be used to represent the note section contained in the NOTE_NLP record. These concepts can be found as parts of document panels.
A small window of text surrounding the term.
comment: Snippet of text around the extracted term.

description: Character offset of the extracted term in the input note.
Raw text extracted from the NLP tool.
comment: Lexical variant extracted from the NLP tool.

description: Name and version of the NLP system that extracted the term. Useful for data provenance.
The date of the note processing.
comment: Date when the note was processed.

description: The date and time of the note processing.
comment: Date and time when the note was processed.

description: Term_exists is defined as a flag that indicates if the patient actually has or had the condition.
comment: Flag indicating whether the term exists.

description: Term_temporal is to indicate if a condition is present or just in the past.
Term_modifiers concatenate all modifiers for different types of entities (conditions, drugs, labs, etc.) into one string.
